text: Lucky indeed are the families that possess a heritage of lace. A lace bridal veil handed down from mother to daughters, a lace-trimmed Christening robe that each generation wears in turn - these are proud possessions, linked to the exquisite lace-making of the past.
handwritten_text: Lucky indeed are the families that possess a heritage of lace. A lace bridal veil handed down from mother to daughters, a lace-trimmed Christening robe that each generation wears in turn - these are proud possessions, linked to the exquisite lace-making of the past.
